name: Out of Coffee
description:
My first time doing a game jam so it was quite stressful. This is far from a finished or polished project but it's in a playable enough state!

'A' and 'D' to go left and right and spacebar to jump. You use the mouse to click prompts but there are no other controls.

I'd like to finish and polish this game at some point but this is what I have for now.

Made for the GMTK 2020 GameJam with the theme being "Out Of Control" My idea was that you were slowly dipping off a caffeine high and it would affect your inputs. Hence as the game progresses you start to lose control.
